mainSequence.step: Authentication system validates and confirms success
Sponsorship Management System fetches summits that match the brand criteria
Summit Coordination System provides details of the selected summit
List of summits is displayed to Sponsor
Sponsor selects a summit to sponsor
Sponsorship Management System displays sponsorship levels and benefits
Sponsorship details and payment information form are shown to the Sponsor
Payment confirmation is sent to the Sponsor
Payment success notification is sent to the Sponsorship Management System
Summit Coordination System assigns Sponsor to the selected summit
Sponsor receives sponsorship confirmation and receipt
